text: If you need something to warm you up this cold weekend, then look no further than this amazing video of the Orange is the New Black cast crashing two fans'wedding. Australian fans Tegan and Louise were going about their nuptials when the former had a very special surprise in store for her OITNB - loving new wife. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below We mean, what better present is there for a super fan than Lea DeLaria – aka Big Boo – popping - up at your nuptials? After the stars'surprise appearance, it got even better as Lea brought along co - stars Danielle Brooks and Aussie Yael Stone – Taystee and Morello, respectively. ` ` As an Australian, we've waited a long time for this to happen,''
